data.text:
ANIMALS

"It's My Life"

SHORT BIOGRAPHY:

The Animals was formed in Newcastle, UK, in 1960, originally called "Alan Price Rhythm´n Blues Combo". Changed name to The Animals in 1963, and got a contract with Columbia records. Their big break-through came in 1964 with the single "House of the Rising Sun". They released two album on Columbia but changed to Decca in 1965 where they recorded a couple of albums.

In 1966/67 lead-singer Eric Burdon reformed the band, calling them Eric Burdon and the Animals, who recorded a handful of Westcoast styled albums on MGM.

The original Animals reformed in late 1970´s to record a couple new albumsKey Band Members:

Eric Burdon: Born 1941, vocals and harmonica. Burdon is beyond question the key member of the Animals, and he sings on all important Animals releases.

Alan Price: Born 1941, organ and piano. Price was one of the original members, but left the band in 1965, but rejoined the band for the reunion albums "Before We Were so Rudely Interrupted" and "Ark".

Hilton Valentine: Born 1943, lead guitar . Original member, but left the band in 1966, but rejoined the band for the reunion albums "Before We Were so Rudely Interrupted" and "Ark".

Chas Chandler: Born 1938, bass. Original member, but left the band in 1966, but rejoined the band for the reunion albums "Before We Were so Rudely Interrupted" and "Ark".

John Steel: Born 1941, drums. Original member, but left the band in 1965, but rejoined the band for the reunion albums "Before We Were so Rudely Interrupted" and "Ark".

Dave Rowberry: Born 1940, keyboard. Replaced Price in 1965. Left when Burdon formed E.B. & the Animals in 1967

Barry Jenkins: Born 1944, drums. Replaced Steel in 1965 and continued with E.B. & the Animals in 1967-1969

Vic Briggs: Born 1945, guitar. Joined E.B. & the Animals in 1967-1968

Danny McCullough: Born 194-, bass. Joined E.B. & the Animals in 1967-1968

John Weider: Born 1947, guitar. Joined E.B. & the Animals in 1967-1969

Zoot Money: Born 1942, keyboards. Joined E.B. & the Animals in 1968-1969

Tom Parker: Born 194-, keyboards. Joined the Animals in 1966-67

Andy Somers: Born 1942, guitar. Joined E.B. & the Animals in 1968-1969

Chords for "San Franciscan Night"

Discography:

Singles

Year Single UK US Album 1964 "Baby Let Me Take You Home" 21 The Animals - reissue 1964 "Gonna Send You Back to Walker" 57 The Animals - reissue 1964 "The House of the Rising Sun" 1 1 The Animals - reissue 1964 "I´m Crying" 8 19 The Animals - reissue 1965 "Don´t Let Me Be Misunderstood" 3 15 Animals Tracks - reissue 1965 "Bring it on Home to Me" 7 32 Animal Tracks - reissue 1965 "We Gotta Get out of This Place" 2 13 Animal Tracks - reissue 1965 "It´s My Life" 7 23 Animal Tracks - reissue 1966 "Inside Looking Out" 12 34 Animalism - reissue 1966 "Don´t Bring Me Down" 6 12 Animalism - reissue 1966 "See See Rider" 10 Animalism - reissue 1966 "Help Me Girl" 14 29 Animalism - reissue 1967 "When I Was Young" 45 15 The Best of Eric Burdon and The Animals Vol 2 1967 "Good Times" 20 15 Winds of Change - reissue 1967 "San Franciscan Nights" 7 9 Winds of Change 1967 "Anything" 80 Winds of Change 1967 "Monterey" 15 Winds of Change - reissue 1968 "Sky Pilot" 40 14 The Twain Shall Meet 1968 "White Houses" 67 Every One of Us 1969 "Ring of Fire" 35 Love is 1983 "The Night" 48 Ark

source for singles charts positions: Wikipedia

My Suggestion For a 80 minutes (app.) Best Of Compilation:

1. Its My Life ( Atkins/DÉrrico) - Best of Animals 1966 MGM

2. We Gotta Get Out Of This Place ( Mann/Weill ) Animal Tracks

3. You´re On My Mind ( Burdon/Rowberry ) Animalism

4. Baby Let Me Take You Home ( Russell/Farrell )- Most Of The Animals 1966 Columbia

5. The House Of The Rising Sun ( Trad. ) - Most Of The Animals 1966 Columbia

6. Don´t Bring Me Down ( Goffin/King ) Animalization

7. Help Me Girl ( English/Weiss ) Eric Is Here

8. A Girl Named Sandoz ( Burdon/Weider ) Best of Eric Burdon and The Animals

9. When I Was Young ( Burdon/Weider/Briggs/McCulloch/Jenkins ) Best Of Eric Burdon and The Animals

10. San Francisco Nights ( The Animals ) Winds of Change

11. Bright Lights, Big City ( Reed ) Animal Tracks

12. I´m Crying ( Burdon/Price ) Best Of The Animals

13. Bring It On Home To Me ( Cooke ) Animal Tracks

14. Roadrunner ( McDaniels ) Animal Tracks

15. Inside Looking Out ( Burdon/Lomax/Lomax/Chandler ) Animalization

16. I´m Going To Change The World ( Burdon ) Most of The Animals

17. Gonna Send You Back To Walker ( Matthews ) Best of The Animals

18. Boom Boom ( Hooker )The Animals

19. Memphis ( Berry )The Animals

20. I´ve Been Around ( Domino ) The Animals

21. Good Times ( The Animals ) Winds of Change

22. Bury My Body ( Trad. ) The Animals

23. Sky Pilot ( The Animals ) The Twain Shall Meet

24. Anything ( The Animals ) Winds of Change

25. Monterey ( The Animals ) The Twain Shall Meet

26. Hotel Hell ( The Animals ) Winds of Change

27. Just the Thought ( The Animals ) The Twain Shall Meet
